title: Looking for Low grade T206 Cobb Portrait and or Bat off shoulder
author: MuncieNolePAZ

posts.post_title: Looking for Low grade T206 Cobb Portrait and or Bat off shoulder
posts.post_content:
Looking for Low grade PSA or SGC (Around a 1.5 or 2)
T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait (Tolstoi, Old Mill, Polar Bear, or Sovereign)
T206 Ty Cobb Bat off Shoulder (Old Mill, Polar Bear, or Sovereign)

I have a 1933 Goudey #149 Ruth PSA A and/or #181 Ruth SGC 1 to trade (See attachment). I have some different back T206 Sam Crawford batting along with some T206 Nap Lajoie that I could trade as well.

Please message me if you have either of the two Cobbs and are interested.

Thanks
Chad
